name: Cube Chaos (AgentXMan)
description:
Hey everyone, i am back with another game after taking a very long break of 160+ days and there is no better way to gain motivation back than a game jam. 

so i made this game for the brackeys 2021.2 game jam and i am happy that i managed to make it after sooooooooooooooooo many days

the game is pretty chaotic and fun, basically its like a sandbox where you spawn in cubes and explosions which will cause the game to be fun and chaotic

gameplay footage: 

(do subscribe the channel if u want to see more of gameplay footages and stuff)

controls:

R = restart level

G = shoot explosives

O = end level/game

Q = slow down time

left click =  spawn cubes

right click = delete cubes

(music - TheFatRat - time lapse)
